errors.invalidusername: The username is invalid or already taken
errors.emailnotunique: The email address you entered is already in use

login.title: User login
login.text: Enter your username and password to log in

resetpassword.title: Reset password
resetpassword.text: Enter your username or email address to reset your password. You will receive a confirmation mail shortly.
resetpassword.confirmation: If your username or email exists in our system, you will receive an email shortly

resetpasswordverification.title: Reset password verification
resetpasswordverification.text: After password reset, you receive a verification code through email. Click the link in the email, or fill out the username or email address and the verification code to complete resetting your password.

success.title: Password has changed
success.text: Your password is changed, you can now log in using your new password.

failed.title: Password reset failed
failed.text: Either your username or email address, or your verification code is incorrect or expired. Please try to reset your password again.

registration.title: Registration form
registration.text: Fill out the following form to register. You will receive in email to confirm your registration.

change-password.title: User - Change password
change-password.text: To change your password, you must first enter your current password. Then chose a new password and confirm that password in the last field. Due to security reasons, we demand passwords to contain at least one lowecase character, one uppercase character, and one digit. The password must be at least 8 characters long.

form.passwords-do-not-match: The new password and the confirm password field do not match

success.title: Password changed
success.text: Your password has changed. You will receive a confirmation email shortly

failed.title: Password change failed
failed.text: Changing your password failed. Please try again

server-down.title: Server down
server-down.description: Oops, the server seems to be not responding to your requests. As we actively monitor our environment, you can assume we've got someone on it already.

error-codes.object-deleted: This item is removed and cannot be modified.
error-codes.not-an-admin: You have to be a system administrator to perform this action
error-codes.value-out-of-range: The value for this component is out of range
error-codes.picture-url-invalid: The URL to the picture is an invalid URL

raceresultcalculated.title: Race results are calculated!
raceresultcalculated.body: New race results are calculated. You earned {{earnedPoints}} points making ${{earnedMoney}}. You now have a total of {{totalPoints}} with {{totalMoney}} money available.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.explainer: Unread notifications appear bright, click or tap notifications to mark them as read.

leagues.title: Leagues
leagues.join-tooltip: Find existing leagues and request to join
leagues.create-tooltip: Create a new league and invite other teams to join

empty-state.title: No leagues found
empty-state.text: With leagues, you can play the Formula 1 Manager game with your friends. Create an isolated league for just you and your friends and invite them to join your league. This way, you can create an isolated competition for just the one you like.
empty-state.jointext: Search for existing leagues and request access to those leagues to join them
empty-state.createtext: Create a league yourself and invite other teams to join your league

create.title: Create a new league
create.text: Name your league, the league name must be at least 5 characters, alphanumeric and unique
create.name-not-unique: The name of your league is already taken, enter a different name

invites.title: Search for teams to join league

errors.requestalreadypending: There is already a request pending to join this league, please wait for approval
errors.invalid-name: The name is invalid for a league
errors.already-in: Team cannot be added to this league because the team is already in
errors.invitation-pending: There is already an invitation pending for this team
errors.invitation-not-found: The invitation could not be found
errors.request-pending: There is already a request pending to join this league, please wait for approval
errors.request-not-found: The request is not found. It's either expired or already assessed
errors.failed-to-leave: Could not leave this league, membership not found (you probably already left?)
errors.not-a-member: You cannot do this, you are not a member of this league
errors.error: Oops, an error occured concerning leagues

leagues.name: Name

delete.title: Delete base team
delete.message: Are you sure you wish to delete base team '{{name}}' from the system?

undelete.title: Undelete base team
undelete.message: Are you sure you wish to undelete base team '{{name}}'?

delete.title: Delete driver
delete.message: Are you sure you wish to delete driver '{{name}}' from the system?

undelete.title: Recover driver
undelete.message: Are you sure you wish to recover driver '{{name}}'?

delete.title: Delete engine
delete.message: Are you sure you wish to delete engine '{{name}}' from the system?

undelete.title: Recover engine
undelete.message: Are you sure you wish to recover engine '{{name}}'?

delete.title: Delete chassis
delete.message: Are you sure you wish to delete chassis '{{name}}' from the system?

undelete.title: Recover chassis
undelete.message: Are you sure you wish to recover chassis '{{name}}'?

empty-state.title: Nothing to see here
empty-state.text: No items found to be shown. You may want to adjust your filter settings, or start adding items
